plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 09-1690

                         JOSEPH PARSLEY

                     Petitioner, Appellant,

                               v.

                    UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

                      Respondent, Appellee.




                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court, issued on May 17, 2010, is amended
as follows:

     On page 12, line 16, "sentencing" should be substituted for
"trial."
